overview: Who wouldn't want to be a member of the "Club of the Beautiful"? Simon and Nina, a young couple, also want nothing more than to belong to this elite circle. Unfortunately, it is not that easy to join this club. Whoever wants to get in has to meet very specific criteria, and these are set by the chairman of the club himself. As a woman, you have to be a bitch who loves to fuck and who has no problems opening her legs for strange men ...
title: Club of the Beautiful
